channel.title: codeswarm on David Amador
channel.description: Recent content in codeswarm on David Amador

item.title: Basalt code swarm
item.description: I discovered code swarm a while ago and decided to test on my own repositories. This is a test on Basalt, and although I’ve been working on the engine since January 2010, only in 2011 did I placed in on a repository so a bunch of stuff is added right on the beginning. This is the result.
item.content:encoded:
I discovered code swarm a while ago and decided to test on my own repositories.

This is a test on Basalt, and although I’ve been working on the engine since January 2010, only in 2011 did I placed in on a repository so a bunch of stuff is added right on the beginning.

This is the result.
